name: Instagram
platform_purpose: Visual discovery, lifestyle positioning, and short-form storytelling.
core_voice: Consistent brand personality across platforms; clear, human, and visually oriented.
tone_adaptation: Inspirational, aspirational, and conversational. Content should feel native, human, and visually driven.
copy_guidelines_summary: Lead with a strong hook in the first 125 characters. For Reels, on-screen text and visual hook are more important than the caption. Use concise, benefit-led language and always include a clear call-to-action.

global_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: 50–150 words for educational posts; shorter for Reels and lightweight content.
global_guidelines.recommended_hashtags: 3–8 highly relevant hashtags, mixing niche and topic-based tags.
global_guidelines.emoji_policy: Allowed but optional. Use sparingly and only if aligned with the brand personality.
